name: Simone Martin
text: I'm a knowledgeable and skilled knowledge engineer with two years of experience. I work in translation, teaching and new technologies. I am currently working at Expert.AI, in the Financed Projects division.
I've honed my Python skills and have a good foundation in Javascript. I take pride in delivering high-quality work, and I'm known for my dependability in completing projects on time.

Before joining Expert.AI, I have been teaching English in a bilingual kindergarten and prior to that I have worked with English summer schools in Bournemouth and Brighton(UK) covering the role of Activity Leader, Academic Intern and Student Services.

Prior to approaching the world of computational linguistics I wrote a dissertation about the benefits of a SEO-based approach to website localisation, offering a concrete example of localised website.

In my spare time I like to learn new skills, especially in the field of coding. Automating boring tasks with python is one of my favourite pastimes and this very website is me figuring out the Django framework.
I'm confident that I can bring value to the organization I'm part of and help tackle challenging projects.
